_meanings:
{@--1@} To know, 
understand, be aware of.

{@--4@} To watch,
be on the alert; <ls>Bk. 8. 27.</ls>

{@--3@} ({%a%}) To
quiet, pacify (a sacrificial animal).
({%b%}) To kill.

{@--6@} To make
intelligible, cause to be understood,
inform.

{@--7@} To make a sign to (any
one), communicate by signs.
